abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio says he will veto City Council bill that would make use of chokeholds by police officers misdemeanor punishable by prison or fine; says legislation is unnecessary as Police Department rules already forbid maneuver.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio has questioned the need for legislation criminalizing chokeholds, since the Police Department already bans their use; the bill would make chokeholds by officers a misdemeanor.
snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio has questioned the need for legislation criminalizing chokeholds, since the Police Department already bans their use; the bill would make chokeholds by officers a misdemeanor.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Vows to Veto Chokehold Bill
headline.print_headline: Mayor Vows to Veto Chokehold Bill
